name: mwd-wordpress-plugin
description: A starter plugin with all the boilerplate done for Vuejs and some useful PHP libraries.

scripts.prod:js: (NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify -t vueify -e assets/src/app.js -o assets/js/build.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && npm run notify:js) || npm run notify:js-error
scripts.prod:scss: (node-sass --output-style=compressed assets/scss/app.scss assets/css/app.css && npm run notify:scss) || npm run notify:scss-error
scripts.dev:js: (NODE_ENV=development browserify -g envify -t vueify -e assets/src/app.js -o assets/js/build.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && npm run notify:js) || npm run notify:js-error
scripts.dev:scss: (node-sass --source-map assets/css/ assets/scss/app.scss assets/css/app.css && npm run notify:scss) || npm run notify:scss-error
scripts.watch:js: (NODE_ENV=development watchify -g envify -t vueify -e assets/src/app.js -o assets/js/build.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] && npm run notify:js) || npm run notify:js-error
scripts.watch:scss: (node-sass -w --source-map assets/css/ assets/scss/app.scss assets/css/app.css && npm run notify:scss) || npm run notify:scss-error

author: Ross Cooper
